Title: Nice Ornate Antiqued Gold Tone Ship Hand Pocket Watch
Description: Nice Ornate Antiqued Gold Tone Ship Hand Pocket Watch Here are the details:Made in USASpecial Feature: Beautiful watch to have in any social event !Dimensions: 2 1/2" x 1 3/4" Diameter We ship via USPS on the next day or at least in 2 business days after payment. All items offered are guaranteed authentic and as describedIMPORTANT TO ALL COUNTRIES EXCEPT USA: For those to be shipped to Canada or any other country, even it only shows up PRIORITY MAIL INTERNATIONAL , we can ship FIRST CLASS INTERNATIONAL (only on countries where available) and please note that sending by First Class Mail International will bring extra special handling charges but even with these charges it will be better than Priority Mail!!We usually add 1 or 2 bucks for handling and packaging charges, but it will depend on the type of item and special handling, but also we can combine shipments to save you on shipping!!!Once you receive the item and you are happy with it, we would appreciate a great feedback and automatically we will feedback in a great positive way!!My ratings for the description are as follows:a) MINT Condition: Flawless No chips, cracks, repairs or other damageb)Excellent Condition: Perfect Condition with 1) Light Wear or Minor Wear:The item has light wear that does not detract from the appearance of the item, and in most cases is not visible to the naked eye (light scratches or light loss of some color) 2)Some Wear :The item has slightly more wear but does not detract from its attractiveness. (Like Scratches, loss of color,etc) c) As Found Condition: As Is, it can include some small chips, hairline cracks, or other damage. Please email any questions you may have prior to the auction closing or before purchasing the item with Buy It Now. ReturnPolicy.Description:
Payment Due within 7 days after closing the auction. 
All Checks must clear our bank before shipment. PayPal Payments ship ASAP.

We do allow returns only if the item is significantly different than described and all postage is non-refundable (In all cases including damaged in transit, shipping charges are not refundable by any means). The item must be authorized for return in advance by us and returned within 7 days of receipt.
